name: unspecifiable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something is unspecifiable, it is not possible to say exactly what it is or to describe it exactly: The items had been in the town's possession from a fairly early, but unspecifiable, date. Her accent was hard to identify - it was eastern European, but otherwise unspecifiable. Related word
specify
More examplesFewer examplesHis desk and table are covered with curious objects - no doubt related to the various unspecifiable projects he has underway.The designer may be restricted by mandatory requirements, and there may also be unspecifiable but significant political restrictions.
